basicInfo.name: Feng Yan
basicInfo.flavor: Feng Yan's relentless training eventually earned him the nickname Bladestorm Lord. His mastery of all blades is unrivaled.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Colossal Strike
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 155% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 190% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 24% Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Thousand Blades
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 175% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 210% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: Ignore Defense

Passive.name: Blade Barrier
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Crit Damage Boost. [Always Active]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Freeze Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Freeze Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 40% Crit Damage Boost. [Always Active]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Soi, Evan, master, chivalry, justice, harmony, dumplings, lamb meat, famous swords
profile.dislikes: Seven Knights, disharmony, injustice, unkept equipment
profile.story: Feng Yan's relentless training eventually earned him the nickname Bladestorm Lord. His mastery of all blades is unrivaled.

basicInfo.name: Feng Yan
basicInfo.flavor: Under Soi's father's tutelage, Feng Yan became famous for fighting with multiple swords. His ability to wield numerous swords earned him the nickname of Storm Blade.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Colossal Strike
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 145% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Thousand Blades
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 160% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 160% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Blade Barrier
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Freeze Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Freeze Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

basicInfo.name: Feng Yan
basicInfo.flavor: Feng Yan's sense of hope died with his commander, but he remains chivalrous and ready to help those in need.
